name: Twice as far or further
description:
The Soulship has crashed.
You are not lost.Get to the Station.

You always have two options. Either you follow your mind's desires, doing the logical thing, or you follow your heart's wishes and do what feels right. Though the game can be won, it is not meant to be won. I would not suggest you try doing that.

This is a submission for the United Game Jam 2020. The theme was "TWO", so I made sure the player always had only two options to pick from. All code, sound and graphics were created by me during the jam, using no game engine, just C#. This is the first jam game I ever finished, and it is the first game overall I'm uploading to itch.io.
